Package com.intellij.lang.documentation

Interface CodeDocumentationProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentationProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroovyDocumentationProvider, JavaDocumentationProvider

    public interface CodeDocumentationProvider
extends DocumentationProvider
    Defines support for JavaDoc-like documentation stub generation when invoked on "Enter within comment" actions in a custom language.
    See Also:
    LanguageDocumentation

      • findExistingDocComment

        PsiComment findExistingDocComment(PsiComment contextElement)
        Finds primary documentation comment within given context.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        contextElement if no other applicable

      • parseContext

        Pair<PsiElement,PsiComment> parseContext(PsiElement startPoint)
        Examines PSI hierarchy identified by the given 'start' element trying to find element which can be documented and it's doc comment (if any).

        Example: 

           int test() {
     return [caret] 1;
   }
        PSI element at the caret (return element) is an entry point. This method is expected to return PSI method element and 'null' as the existing doc comment then.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - start traversal point
        Returns:
        comment anchor which is a given element or its anchor if the one is found and its doc comment (if existing). This method may return 'null' as an indication that no doc comment anchor and existing comment is available; returned pair must have non-null PSI element and nullable existing comment references then

      • generateDocumentationContentStub

        java.lang.String generateDocumentationContentStub(PsiComment contextComment)
        Generate documentation comment content for given context.
        Parameters:
        contextComment - context psi comment
        Returns:
        documentation content for given context if any
